text: Limebank is an under construction terminal station on the Trillium Line in Ottawa, Ontario. When constructed, it will be the southern terminus of the Stage 2 O-Train expansion and is scheduled for completion in 2022. The station will be elevated with two side platforms and is located west of Limebank Road, south of Earl Armstrong Road and east of Main Street. ==References== Category:Trillium Line stations Category:Railway stations scheduled to open in 2022
title: Limebank station
